surfaces

Interface EditableSurface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FVPolygonMesh, NURBS, PolygonMesh

    public interface EditableSurface
    Interface which defines the methods for dynamically changeable surfaces.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add2Vertices(Point3D p1, Point3D p2, java.lang.String instruct, double w)
      Adds two vertices to the current model.
      void add3Vertices(Point3D p1, Point3D p2, Point3D p3, java.lang.String instruct, double w)
      Adds two vertices to the current model.
      void addVertex(Point3D p, java.lang.String instruct)
      Adds one vertex to the current model.

    • Method Detail

      • addVertex

        void addVertex(Point3D p,
               java.lang.String instruct)
        Adds one vertex to the current model.
        Parameters:
        p - Point to add to the vertices.
        instruct - instruction for the vertex

      • add2Vertices

        void add2Vertices(Point3D p1,
                  Point3D p2,
                  java.lang.String instruct,
                  double w)
        Adds two vertices to the current model.
        Parameters:
        p1 - First point to add to the vertices.
        p2 - Second point to add to the vertices.
        instruct - instruction for the vertex
        w - Weight for the vertices.

                  Point3D p3,

                  double w)
        Adds two vertices to the current model.
        Parameters:
        p1 - First point to add to the vertices.
        p2 - Second point to add to the vertices.
        p3 - Third point to add to the vertices.
        instruct - instruction for the vertex
        w - Weight for the vertices.
